summary: This is an internal FBI email chain regarding the arrest and processing of Ghislaine Maxwell on July 2, 2020. It discusses her transport to Merrimack County Jail and the logistics of her initial court appearance via Skype.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the subject of the email, being taken to Merrimack County jail for processing and scheduled for an initial court appearance via Skype.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: The sender of the initial email from FBI New York, providing information about Maxwell's processing and court appearance.

events.title: Arrest and Processing of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is taken to Merrimack County jail for processing following her arrest. Her initial court appearance is scheduled to be conducted via Skype.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested and processed on July 2, 2020.
She was taken to Merrimack County Jail following her arrest.
Her initial court appearance was scheduled to be conducted remotely via Skype.
The communication is an internal FBI email regarding the logistics of her arrest and court proceedings.
